title: alias name in discover not updating
body:
**Title:** 	 These discover tags are by the same user. Changing your profile name is not reflected in Discover (it does not update to the new profile name).

**Device:** 	 samsung SM-G935F, OS Level 23

**Memory:** 	 2336.0/3562.0 MB

**Storage:** 	 15.34/25.44 GB

**Battery:** 	 87, Charging through USB cable

**App Version:** 	 1.0 (1)

**Duration:** 	 535

**Console Log:**
